title: RTRMH Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in interview for 15 Senior Resident Posts
description: The Rao Tula Ram Memorial Hospital (RTRMH) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 15 Senior Resident Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Post-graduation, MBBS, MD/MS, DNB, and Diploma can apply for the RTRMH Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limi...
